Headline: #53 Pulaski Temporary Southbound Reroute near Pulaski/Fullerton
ShortDescription: Southbound 53 Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted via Pulaski, Diversey, Kostner, Fullerton and Pulaski, due to street blockage near Pulaski/Fullerton.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #53 Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted via Pulaski, Diversey, Kostner, Fullerton and Pulaski, due to street blockage near Pulaski/Fullerton.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
